skillTree.localised_description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
From the verdant depths, the Lady rises to protect the faithful.
Having spent much of his time delving through archaic crypts and ruined temples, Rodrik has a keen eye for valuables.
This man is a paragon of Bretonnia. It is a privilege to serve at his side.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -4% for Lords and Heroes
	(Hero's army)

Upkeep: -8% for Lords and Heroes
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

skillTree.localised_description: Bretonnia is renowned for its unstoppable cavalry. They have spent centuries perfecting the feeding regime of their mounts.
Reserve your loathing for the evil and the monstrous, and hate them with all of your fury.
This one is an appalling force of death on the battlefield. He stampedes ahead at the slightest provocation, completely oblivious to those under his command.
If you are not capable of killing them yourself then I bid that you stand aside so that I may, whelp!
This one, whether he knows it or not, has the favour of the Lady. She will aid him whenever he is in dire peril.
You need only a fleeting glimpse of the light emanating from this knight to know that he has been chosen by the Lady.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

skillTree.localised_description: When you defend your homeland side-by-side with a living legend you become a part of his story.
We shall not allow their unholy taint to mar the beauty of our lands any longer! Ride them down!

effects.description: Melee defence: +4 when fighting against Undead
Melee defence: +6 when fighting against Undead
Melee defence: +12 when fighting against Undead

skillTree.localised_description: This Paladin's virtuous radiance inspires his troops to leap into the fray.
Ensuring his men stay engaged takes some of the weight away from this Paladin's sword arm.
The truly chivalrous are charitable too.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -3% for cavalry units
	(Hero's army)

Vigour loss reduction: -6% for cavalry units
	(Hero's army)

Vigour loss reduction: -10% for cavalry units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 5%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero
Unit is a Lord or Hero

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text:
When charging into an enemy unit:
	  Charge Bonus duration is doubled.
	 Enemy units take a  Leadership penalty as if they have been attacked in the flank.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having spent most of his time living in the jungle, this feels like home.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 when fighting against Lizardmen
	(all units in army)

Unit experience gain: +100% for units when fighting against Lizardmen
	(all units in army)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base
target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This Knight's skill, prowess, and finesse with blade and lance are beyond compare; his bravery, horsemanship, and chivalry above all others.
Most loyal of Companions, this Knight fights always at the side of his Liege.

effects.description:
Leadership: +10 for Knight units
	(all units in army)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base
target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

backgroundSkills.localised_description: In the glory of the charge is this Knight most alive, ever in the forefront of battle.
A master of the feint and riposte, this Knight's skill at turning an enemy's strength against them is legendary.
So great is this Knight's skill with a lance that none can unhorse them.
Haughty, proud, and skilful, this Knight never takes a backward step in the face of adversity.

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Steeled by this Knight's bravery, those around them fight with the courage of the Breton himself.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: With a heart of stone and resolute temper this Knight stands unbowed, spilling the foe's blood with each sweep and thrust.
Unbending even in the face of the greatest beasts, this Knight mounts their heads on the wall of his feasting chamber.
A hermit-Knight, this one nevertheless always returns to fight for his beloved king.
This Knight has great contempt for those who eschew the martial values of meeting one's opponent face to face.
